definition: to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The intelligent serial-port card with CPU is selected on it.
sentences.chinese: 选用卡上带有CPU的智能串口卡来扩展串口。

sentences.english: The intelligent serial-port card with CPU is selected on it.
sentences.chinese: 选用卡上带有CPU的智能串口卡来扩展串口。

sentences.english: We got rid of serial and parallel ports.
sentences.chinese: 我们抛弃了串口和并口。

sentences.english: Set the serial port connecting the host to the device under test.
sentences.chinese: 将连接主机的串口设置为接受测试的设备。

sentences.english: The design has been finely applied to multi-user card.
sentences.chinese: 该设计已成功应用于多串口卡产品开发中。

sentences.english: Meantime we study serial communication of frequency converter in computer and single-chip.
sentences.chinese: 同时，开展了计算机与单片机的串口通信研究。

sentences.english: The system adopts single main-station to control the serial ports under free port mode.
sentences.chinese: 系统采用单主站方式，在自由口模式下控制串口。

sentences.english: Using' 8-channel serial POrtcard, it can realize comrntalcation with other syStem.
sentences.chinese: 配有多串口卡，能够与其他系统进行实时串行通讯。

sentences.english: The value is used to set the speed of the serial port used for debugging remote targets.
sentences.chinese: 这个值用来设置调试远程目标的串口传输速度。

sentences.english: Connect to another computer using your serial, parallel, or infrared port.
sentences.chinese: 使用串口，并口或红外端口连接到其它计算机。

sentences.english: A student design of microcontroller-based serial data acquisition system.
sentences.chinese: 一个学生设计的基于串口的单片机数据采集系统。

sentences.english: Internal firmware upgradeable through the serial port or network.
sentences.chinese: 内部固件升级通过串口或网络。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
